name: Missile Command 360
description:
In Missile Command 360 you battle against a friend to gain dominion of a lowly planet called earth.

It is on!

You either take control of the attacking forces relentlessly sending one barrage of devastating rockets after another against the planet surface or choose to stay with the defenders taking up a desperate fight to save the planet.

As the defender you are in a tough position - your only chance of survival consists of launching your remaining rockets against the enemy to destroy the incoming missiles before they hit the ground. But don't worry, your revenge will come as after the first round players switch places and the battle begins anew.

May the fiercest space emperor be declared winner!

Space Credits

Missile Command 360 was developed as part of the MultiMediaTechnology Bachelor program at Salzburg University of Applied Sciences as MultiMediaProject 1.

Game Design, Programming and Art by Fabian Linzbauer.

  • The background image is a modified version of ansimuz' Space Background, License (CC0).
  • The font used is Kenney Fonts, License (CC0).
  • Sound from itch.io from users:
    • Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment
    • Frelon-K Games
    • Goose Ninja
    • Jonathan So
